segments.text: I'm calling to tell you that the merchandise ordered last month has not arrived yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , hold on a moment . I'll check it out . But we have already shipped it to you last month . Would you like us to contact the express company to know what's going on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please find out the reason as soon as possible . We are in bad need of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I am terribly sorry for the trouble you are getting into.We will contact you first thing , once we know the reason .
segments.speaker: S2
